name: 沈耀明
objective: 資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
schedule:
Weeks	Date	Subjects
1	2/21	Course Introduction
2	2/28	國定假日
3	3/6	Ch1. Introduction to Computer Organization
4	3/13	Ch2. Data Representation in Computer Systems
5	3/20	Ch2a. Data Representation in Computer Systems
6	3/27	Ch2b. Focus on Codes for Data Recording and Transmission
7	4/3	Ch3. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
8	4/10	Ch3a. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
9	4/17	Midterm Test期中考
10	4/24	Ch4. An Introduction to a Simple Computer
11	5/1	Ch4a An Introduction to a Simple Computer
12	5/8	Ch5. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
13	5/15	Ch5a. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
14	5/22	Ch5b. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
15	5/29	Ch6. Memory
16	6/5	Ch6a. Memory
17	6/12	Ch7. Input/Output and Storage Systems
18	6/19	Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
評分標準:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔40%
3.	作業佔15%, 每次佔5%, 遲交一天扣0.5%.
4.	課堂表現佔10%, 每缺席一次扣1%, 遲到早退扣0.5%, 缺席超過5次者本項分數為0分. 表現優異者隨時加分, 最多本項加到10%, 表現不好者隨時扣分, 最多本項扣到0%.
materials:
本學期使用的課本:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 3/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
連絡人: 儲方
電話:0988202210
